en.purpose: To provide better discrimination of prognosis for MM based on the genetics and other routinely used lab values in conjunction with the original ISS Staging System.
en.use:
Use only in patients recently diagnosed with multiple myeloma. 

Formula: 
1. Assign ISS stage:

                                                                                                      Serum albumin, g/dL
                                                                                                  ≥3.5                              <3.5
Serum β2 microglobulin, mg/L  <3.5                                    ISS I                              ISS II
                                                         3.5-5.4                                ISS II                             ISS II
                                                         ≥5.5                                    ISS III                           ISS III


2. Stage R-ISS according to iFISH and LDH:

                                                                            High-risk cytogenetic abnormalities by iFISH*              LDH
                                                                                No                                    Yes                                        Normal/High

ISS I                                                                         R-ISS I                              R-ISS II                                   Normal
                                                                                R-ISS II                             R-ISS II                                    High

ISS II                                                                         R-ISS II                             R-ISS II                                    Normal
                                                                                 R-ISS II                             R-ISS II                                    High

ISS III                                                                        R-ISS II                             R-ISS III                                   Normal
                                                                                 R-ISS III                            R-ISS III                                   High

*High-risk = presence of del(17p) and/or translocation t(4;14) and/or translocation t(14;16).                                   
R-ISS interpretation:
R-ISS Stage               Median progression-free survival
I                                  66 months
II                                 42 months
III                                29 months
en.misuse: Not to use in patients with relapsed myeloma, smoldering myeloma or MGUS.

other_details.references: 1. Palumbo A, et. al. Revised International Staging System for Multiple Myeloma: a Report From International Myeloma Working Group. JCO 2015; 33: 2863-2869.
